title: Autistic child: a behavioural approach
creator_credit: William Rose and CRM Educational Films
brief_description: Describes some of the characteristic behaviours exhibited by autistic children and illustrates the use of detailed behavioural techniques to teach language and apropriate behaviour. Shows how training in language and social skills can make a dramatic difference in outcome for autistic children.
